import axios from 'axios' import '../App.css' import { BsFillCloudLightningRainFill } from 'react-icons/bs' const Weather = () => { const baseURL = "https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather" const getWeatherData = async () => { await axios.get(baseURL + '?appid={API key}&q=Pretoria') .then(function (response) { // handle success console.log(response); }) .catch(function (error) { // handle error console.log(error); }) } return (
